thread.section_title: Hotel Madeleine Plaza - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (Paris, France) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Excellent Location, Great Staff
thread.title_full: Excellent Location, Great Staff - Review of Hotel Madeleine Plaza, Paris, France - TripAdvisor

author: Leoni S
title: Excellent Location, Great Staff
text: My husband and I stayed over a long weekend. Everything was wonderful, amazing service. The room was small (as expected in Paris) but very clean. Good sized bathroom and separate toilet. Comfortable bed and great view from the room! The location is amazing! We were able to walk everywhere! Great shopping on your door step! We will definitely stay here again when visiting Paris.
